class SoapQuery;
Query 
url
for action specified in 
action
.

this(in SoapActionData action, in string url);
Execute a SoapQuery

This gets the data from tho router using a HTTP-Socket, then creates a parser-class and returns its result.

Params:
SoapActionData action The action to perform
string url Host:Port to query

const string toString();
Returns the data extracted from the SOAP-Query
